author: __acidichydrogen__
content: I submitted my application yesterday as well! Looking forward to the program and excited to learn from everyone!

author: mariohavel
content: The deadline for application was just extended to June 18, Sunday! You can take a time during the weekend to submit it and if you are still not sure about the program details, checkout the town hall call recording. Everything in the blog post: https://blog.ethereum.org/2023/06/01/ethereum-protocol-fellowship-fourth-apps-open

content: Where is the best place to discuss ideas for project proposals before actually opening a pull request?
